divs: Sighting DetailsWe were swimming down at Nelson's Landing which is on Lake Mojave. We were floating around looking at the stars. My sister noticed 4 objects moving in the sky. As we watched, 2 objects appeared to fly away from earth and while the one of the other objects sped up to join the other object and they flew away on an easterly trajectory. I watch the stars often, but have never seen a satellite exhibit any erratic behavior like I seen last night, nor have I ever seen one match the speed these objects had. Unfortunately we were swimming and didn't have a camera handy.
Summary: 4 high flying objects appeared similar to how satelites in orbit, except speed was much too fast and non orbital motion was shown.
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Henderson
There were no other sightings in Henderson on or around August 20th 2010
